kw.name: Then "Target Postings" Are Registered In The System
When Target Postings Are Updated
kw.doc: EXPECTED PRECONDITION: When this method is called, REGISTERED_POSTINGS = pre-set postings + target postings. Note that REGISTERED_POSTINGS are the the postings that have been read from the API in the previous test case: Creating "Target Postings". Note that all the postings in REGISTERED_POSTINGS have all the fields necessary (i.e. title , content, url, id, timestamp fields)

kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: Delete All Sessions
kw.doc: Removes all the session objects

suite.doc: This test suite uses Admin request headers to test BlogPostAPI. For an admin, BlogPostAPI provides GET, POST, PUT, DELETE methods as well as OPTIONS method. The URL of the API is: https://glacial-earth-31542.herokuapp.com/api/postings/
